Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: John Haughton
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Toshiba for my daughter as a birthday present. I delivered the laptop during my visit to her last month. It was purchased after reviewing several other sources - including Toshiba Direct, Best Buy, and Brands Mart. This was the best price for the specifications. Trishan was obviously pleased as this machine will meet her expectations as a webmaster.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: sfras
Reviews.Content: I think you get a lot for the price I use my laptop a lot I do homeschool work and I DJ so always on my old Toshiba was fine but felt old and when I used multiple things my music froze skipped just bad so I thought ill get a new one and when I first got it and turned it on the sound was horrible but that can be fixed by turning on DTS sound good apps like the touchscreen although it leaves a lot of fingerprints to clean for the price you get a good laptop I think although my opinion which may change in time last Toshiba I had for 4 years so I hope this one last about the same

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel® Core® i3-3110 processor
Windows 8.1
4GB DDR3 memory
750GB (5400RPM) hard drive
Mobile Intel® graphics
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite C50-AST3NX2 Laptop Notebook Windows 8 - Intel i3-3110M 2.40GHz - 4GB RAM - 750GB HD - 15.6 inch display
